code:
udf((pPATH: String, pFILENAME: String, pUKDWDATADATE: String) => {
      var sFilePath: Any = null
      var cmd: Any = null
      var Ans: Any = null
      var iFileCount: Any = null
      var sFileName: Any = null
      Deffun
      rtcreatetriggerfile(pPATH, pFILENAME, pUKDWDATADATE)
      Calling
      "DSU.rtCreateTriggerFile"
      sFilePath = ds_string_concat(ds_string_concat(pPATH, "/"), pFILENAME)
      cmd = ds_string_concat(
        ds_string_concat("ls ", sFilePath),
        "* 2>>/dev/null | wc -l"
      )
      dsexecute("UNIX", cmd, o1, o2)
      iFileCount = ds_trim(ereplace(o1, Config.FM, ""))
      if (iFileCount > 0.0) {
        sFileName =
          ds_string_concat(ds_string_concat(pFILENAME, "."), pUKDWDATADATE)
       else sFileName = pFILENAME
      Ans = rtcreatetriggerfile(pPATH, sFileName, pUKDWDATADATE)
      Ans
    })
}
